campaign_id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign

merchant_id.description: The unique identifier of the partner merchant the campaign belongs to

campaign_rate.description: The cashback rate of the campaign

begin_timestamp.description: The beginning of the campaign. ISO-8601 time and date.

end_timestamp.description: The planned ending of the campaign. ISO-8601 time and date.

user_set.description: List of user IDs that have activated this campaign

transactions_set.description: List of transaction IDs that have activated this campaign

valid_for.description: The number of times the campaign can be activated

campaign_title.description: The title of the campaign to be displayed in FE

campaign_description.description: The description of the campaign to be displayed in FE

locations.description: The valid partner merchant locations for this campaign

active.description: Whether the campaign is currently active
